inline.description:
Install the http-hello app
1. Type /apps debug-add-manifest --url http://localhost:8065/plugins/com.mattermost.apps/example/hello/mattermost-app.json
2. /apps install --app-id http-hello
3. In the modal that opens type 1234 as the app secret and click Approve and Install
inline.expectedResult:
On 1. Manifest has been stored
On 2. Modal opens with App info and showing the bindings that will be added
On 3. http-hello bot will post:
Hallo სამყარო (http) has been installed into this channel and will now greet newly joining users
Help shows No matching suggestions  with an exclamation point

inline.description:
Unknown argument
1. Type /http-hello message @<username> pickles
(do not select --other or --message)
inline.expectedResult: 1. Help shows Parsing error Unable to identify arguments

inline.description:
Single word text
1. Type /http-hello message @<username>
2. Type --message or select it from the autocomplete
3. Then type pickles  as your message text
4. type a space
inline.expectedResult:
On 3. Help shows Message: "pickles"
On 4. Help text is removed and autocomplete shows next available argument (--other)

inline.description:
Multi-word word text
1. Type /http-hello message @<username>
2. Type --message or select it from the autocomplete
3. Then type "pickles and hit space
4. Continue typing to make the message "pickles in a jar
5. Close the " and send the post
inline.expectedResult:
On 3. Help shows Message: "pickles "
On 4. Help shows Message: "pickles in a jar"
On 5. Survey sent successfully
